enGB: Feral kitstune are the savage counterparts to their more civilized kin. Usually isolating themselves in the wild, they care more about strength and survival than scholarly pursuits. These kitsune gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, and -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}. This racial {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}trait{/g} alters the kitsune's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} modifiers.'
